name: Rolling Ball (rhysreynz04)
description:
A simple platformer game with many levels and stages. work your way from one end of the platforms to the other with the finish line. touch the finish line to complete the level and proceed to the next level. New features like portals and jump pads have been added to the game, but only on the 4th stage so far. This game is a work in progress. There are updates Monthly to add more levels, stages and different types of features. There will be different textures for the ball when i get the "SHOP" working.

I am new to game development. This is my first public game. i have other ideas for different types of games.
